properties.address: Christ Church Centre, Norwich, US Addresses Only NR3 4LA
properties.description: Open to anyone in the community. Book Swap is held in the large hall. We have hot drinks, a variety of cakes and a wide selection of books available to borrow.
properties.title: Christ Church Centre

properties.address: Church Avenue, Norwich, Norfolk NR2 2AQ
properties.description: If you don’t have a little one, please feel free to sit in another area of the church. Christ Church is open daily for visitors but is only heated on Sunday mornings for services and on Mondays. In the afternoon from 2-3.30, Chat over a Cuppa takes place. This is a chance to meet others over a (free!) cup of tea/coffee and is open to anyone.
properties.title: Christ Church Eaton
